member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.Ide.Common.RadWindow.ProjectManagement
member.summary: Utility class for Design - Time VisualStudio.NET project management.

member.name: T:Telerik.RadWindowUtils.PropertyCategory
member.summary: Defines the common property categories' names

member.name: P:Telerik.RadWindowUtils.RadControl.Version
member.summary: Gets the component's current version.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadWindowUtils.RadControl.UseEmbeddedScripts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the embedded JavaScript files or not.
member.value: True if embedded JavaScript files are to be used; otherwise false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: Use this property for debugging purposes or to apply any modifications to the JavaScript files.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowMinimizeModes
member.summary: Specifies the minimize options for the radWindow object

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowMinimizeModes.SameLocation
member.summary: Window is minimized but stays at the same left/top position

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowMinimizeModes.MinimizeZone
member.summary: Window is minimized to a toolbar object that controls its minimization behavior

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowMinimizeModes.Default
member.summary: Default

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags
member.summary: Specifies the behaviors of the radWindow object

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.None
member.summary: No behavior is specified.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Resize
member.summary: The object can be resized.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Minimize
member.summary: The object can be minimized.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Close
member.summary: The object can be closed.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Pin
member.summary: The objct can be pinned.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Maximize
member.summary: The object can be maximized.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Move
member.summary: The object can be moved.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Reload
member.summary: The object will have a reload button.

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBehaviorFlags.Default
member.summary: Default object behavior: all together.
member.value: (Minimize | Maximize | Close | Pin | Resize | Move | Reload)

member.name: T:Telerik.RadWindowUtils.LocalizationBuilder
member.summary: Summary description for LocalizationBuilder.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.OnClientShow
member.summary: Get or sets the client function to be called when a window dialog is being opened.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.OnClientClose
member.summary: Gets or sets the client function to be called when a window dialog is being closed.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.OnClientPageLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets the client function to be called when a page is loaded in a r.a.d.window dialog.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.ClientCallBackFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the client callback function that will be called when a window dialog is being closed.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.OpenerElementId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id (ClientID if a runat=server is used) of a html element, which, when clicked, will automatically open/show the r.a.d.window.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.OffsetElementId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id (ClientID if a runat=server is used) of a html element, whose left and top position will be used as 0,0 of the r.a.d.window object when it is first shown.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.MinimizeZoneId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id (ClientID if a runat=server is used) of a html element where the windows will be "docked" when minimized.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.IconUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the url of the icon in the upper left corner of the r.a.d.window titlebar.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.MinimizeIconUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the url of the minimized icon of the r.a.d.window.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.MinimizeMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimize options for the RadWindow object. SameLocation, MinimizeZone.
member.value:
The default value is not set. Other possible values are the SameLocation or MinimizeZone which are members of
RadWindowMinimizeModes Enumeration.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.Behavior
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the behavior of this object - if can be resized, has expand/collapse commands, closed command, etc.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.InitialBehavior
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the initial behavior of this object - most useful to specify an initially minimized, maximized or pinned window.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.NavigateUrl
member.summary: Specifies the URL that will originally be loaded in the r.a.d.window (can be changed on the client).

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL that will originally be loaded in the r.a.d.window (can be changed on the client)

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical distance from the browser top.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal offset from the browser left side.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.DestroyOnClose
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the window will be made inaccessible once it is closed.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.ReloadOnShow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page that is loaded in the window should be loaded everytime from the server or will leave the browser default behaviour

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.ShowContentDuringLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page that is loaded in the window should be shown during the loading process, or when it has finished loading.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.VisibleOnPageLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the window will open automatically when the aspx page is loaded on the client.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.VisibleTitlebar
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the window has a titlebar visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.VisibleStatusbar
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the window has a visible status bar or not.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowBase.Modal
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a dialog is modal or not.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindow.Splash
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the window is used as a splash screen that is hidden at page load.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.AlertTemplate
member.summary: This property allows to specify the HTML for the alert popup, which will override the alerttemplate defined in the RadControls/Window/Skins/CURRENT_SKIN/CoreTemplate.xml file.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.ConfirmTemplate
member.summary: This property allows to specify the HTML for the confirm popup, which will override the alerttemplate defined in the RadControls/Window/Skins/CURRENT_SKIN/CoreTemplate.xml file.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.PromptTemplate
member.summary: This property allows to specify the HTML for the prompt popup, which will override the alerttemplate defined in the RadControls/Window/Skins/CURRENT_SKIN/CoreTemplate.xml file.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.MinimizeTemplate
member.summary: This property allows to specify the HTML for the minimize popup, which will override the alerttemplate defined in the RadControls/Window/Skins/CURRENT_SKIN/CoreTemplate.xml file.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.SplashTemplate
member.summary: This property allows to specify the HTML for the splash popup, which will override the alerttemplate defined in the RadControls/Window/Skins/CURRENT_SKIN/CoreTemplate.xml file.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.PreserveClientState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether window objects' state (size, location, behavior) will be persisted in a client cookie to restore state over page postbacks.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.EnableStandardPopups
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether r.a.d.window versions of the standard the browser popups (alert, prompt and confirm) will be sent to the client (optimizes rendering size if they will not be used).

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.Overlay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether on IE a transparent IFrame will be set behind each client window, so as to avoid dropdowns and list elements on the page to 'show through' the window's titlebar.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.Shortcuts
member.summary: This property is used to allow associating keyboard shortcuts with RadWindowManager client commands.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.UseClassicWindows
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default browser windows should be used, instead of the RadWindow object on the client

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the localization (language) to be used for a RadWindow.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.Skin
member.summary: Gets or sets the r.a.d.window skin used.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadWindowManager.SingleNonMinimizedWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the window manager allows only a single active non-minimized window and all other windows are automatically minimized.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection
member.summary: Summary description for WindowCollection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.Add(Telerik.WebControls.RadWindow)
member.summary: Adds a RadWindow object to the collection of Windows.
member.param: The RadWindow object to add to the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.IndexOf(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a zero based index of a RadWindow object depending on the passed index. Only int and string indexes are valid.
member.param: The zero-based index or the ID of the searched RadWindow object.
member.returns: A zero based index of the RadWindow object in the collection, or -1 if the RadWindow object is not found.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Telerik.WebControls.RadWindow)
member.summary: Adds a Tab object in the collection at the specified index.
member.param: The index after which the RadWindow object is inserted.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.Remove(Telerik.WebControls.RadWindow)
member.summary: Deletes a RadWindow object from the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the RadWindow object from the collection at the specified index.
member.param: The index in collection at which the RadWindow object will be deleted.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.Clear
member.summary: Removes all RadWindow objects in the collection of Windows.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.Contains(Telerik.WebControls.RadWindow)
member.summary: Checks whether a specific RadWindow object is in the collection of Windows.
member.returns: True if the RadWindow is found, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.WindowCollection.Item(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a RadWindow object depending on the passed index. Only integer and string indexes are valid.
